SafeBerks provides safe haven and ongoing support for victims of domestic violence and sexual assault. Our advocacy and education programs increase awareness of oppression and promote the prevention of domestic violence and sexual assault.

During the current health crisis, we know that victims of domestic violence and sexual assault may be trapped at home with their abuser. It is estimated that there is at least a 20% increase in these acts of violence. It may also be more difficult for victims to seek help or get information about where to get help.

We offer many services including counseling, legal support, and emergency shelter to victims and survivors of these crimes. All services are FREE and Confidential. These services are available in English, Spanish or any language needed. Safe Berks serves all people without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, or ability.

http://www.safeberks.org/
